text.section:
In this section, "taxing official" means:
as to the federal government:
any official of the United States Treasury Department; or
any collector of federal taxes; and
as to the government of any state, any state official who is responsible under the law of that state for:
the assessment process;
the imposition of taxes; or
the collection of taxes.

section.section:
The information that the Department may provide under this section may be obtained from:
any tax report or return that is filed under law; or
any tax audit or investigation.

text.section:
The Department may provide information under this section only if:
the Department is satisfied that the information will be used for tax purposes only; and
the federal or state government to which the information is to be released provides similar information to the tax officials of this State.
